name: blowfish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a fish, found in warm and tropical seas, that can make itself larger by filling its stomach with water or air: Fugu, the poisonous Japanese blowfish, must be carefully prepared to remove its toxic parts. Synonym
pufferfish
